statements: SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE case_id = 101;
SELECT victim_name, incident_date, status FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE incident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT count(*) AS total_cases FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE status = 'resolved';
SELECT case_id, evidence, status FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE bully_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE status='pending';
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases ORDER BY incident_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT bully_name FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE status='resolved' ORDER BY bully_name ASC;
SELECT victim_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT count(*) AS total_cases, status FROM cyberbullying_cases GROUP BY status HAVING total_cases > 2 ORDER BY total_cases DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases ORDER BY incident_date DESC
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction FROM law_enforcement_agencies
SELECT contact_person, contact_email FROM law_enforcement_agencies
SELECT evidence FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE victim_name='Alice'
SELECT bully_name, victim_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY victim_name DESC, bully_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement_agencies WHERE jurisdiction = 'City' OR jurisdiction = 'County' ORDER BY agency_name;
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE bully_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT victim_name, bully_name, incident_date FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE victim_name = 'Alice' OR victim_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY incident_date ASC;
SELECT agency_name, jurisdiction, contact_person FROM law_enforcement_agencies WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY jurisdiction, agency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases;
SELECT case_description, case_date FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT reported_by, location FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE case_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM investigation_team WHERE team_name = 'Cyber Crime Unit';
SELECT team_lead, jurisdiction FROM investigation_team WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_description, reported_by FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE location='School';
SELECT case_id, MAX(case_date) AS latest_case_date FROM cyberbullying_cases GROUP BY case_id;
SELECT cn.note_id, cn.note_date, cn.note, it.team_lead FROM case_notes cn JOIN investigation_team it ON cn.investigator = it.team_lead;

SELECT c.case_id, c.case_description, it.team_name, cn.note FROM cyberbullying_cases c JOIN investigation_team it ON c.reported_by = it.team_lead JOIN case_notes cn ON c.case_id = cn.case_id GROUP BY c.case_id;
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingCases;
SELECT case_id, victim_name, location FROM CyberbullyingCases WHERE location = 'School';
SELECT evidence_id, evidence_description FROM Evidence ORDER BY evidence_id DESC;
SELECT team_name, lead_investigator, investigator_count FROM InvestigationTeam WHERE investigator_count > 5;
SELECT victim_name, perpetrator_name FROM CyberbullyingCases WHERE perpetrator_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CyberbullyingCases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, location FROM CyberbullyingCases WHERE perpetrator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT perpetrator_name, victim_name, location FROM CyberbullyingCases WHERE location = 'School';
SELECT * FROM InvestigationTeam WHERE investigator_count > 5;
SELECT team_name, lead_investigator FROM InvestigationTeam WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases;
SELECT case_description, reported_by, report_timestamp FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE resolution_status = 'pending';
SELECT e.data_type, e.data_location, c.case_description FROM evidence_data e JOIN cyberbullying_cases c ON e.case_id = c.case_id;
SELECT t.team_id, t.team_name, t.team_lead, t.location, c.case_description FROM investigation_team t JOIN cyberbullying_cases c ON t.team_lead = c.reported_by;
SELECT l.log_id, l.log_timestamp, l.log_message, u.username FROM communication_logs l JOIN suspect_users u ON l.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE resolution_status = 'Pending';
SELECT case_description, report_timestamp FROM cyberbullying_cases WHERE reported_by = 'Alice';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM suspect_users WHERE last_access >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM evidence_data ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM investigation_team WHERE location = 'New York';
